attributes.action: make the weekend 3 days long for me and Leanna
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: well me and Leanna would like a 3 day weekend as working on a friday is pointless and every knows no one actually works on a Friday, all anyone does is email each other talking about what your doing at the weekend and how drunk we are all going to get!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
